hook: I fixed my afternoon energy crash in 2 weeks
content: I fixed my afternoon energy crash in 2 weeks. The game-changer: eating protein within 30 minutes of waking up. No more 3pm slump, no more reaching for sugary snacks. Try 20g protein before coffee tomorrow.

hook: The 5-minute morning routine that changed everything
content:
The 5-minute morning routine that changed everything:

1) 30 seconds: Feet on floor, 3 deep breaths
2) 2 minutes: Sunlight exposure (even cloudy days)
3) 1 minute: Write down one priority for today
4) 1.5 minutes: Protein-rich breakfast prep

Simple but powerful.

hook: Counterintuitive: the best time to exercise for sleep
content: Counterintuitive: the best time to exercise for better sleep isn't morning or eveningâ€”it's 4-6 hours before bedtime. This timing helps your core temperature drop naturally when you want to fall asleep.

hook: Let's talk about stress management today
content: Let's talk about stress management today. Stress is something everyone deals with. There are many different approaches you can try. Some people find meditation helpful. Others prefer exercise. Find what works for you.

hook: Myth: You need 8 hours of sleep every night
content:
Myth: You need 8 hours of sleep every night.

Reality: You need 7-9 hours of quality sleep cycles.

ðŸ§µ Thread on what actually matters for sleep:

1) Consistency beats duration
2) Sleep cycles matter more than total time
3) Individual variation is huge
4) Quality > quantity
Micro-step for better focus: Set a 25-minute timer. Work on one task only. When it rings, take a 5-minute break. This 'Pomodoro' technique trains your brain to sustain attention without burnout.

Quick tip for better hydration: drink water when you wake up. Some people add lemon. Others prefer it plain. Generally speaking, morning hydration is important for most people. Try to be consistent with your approach.

hook: 67% of people who try this sleep hack see results in 1 week
content:
67% of people who try this sleep hack see results in 1 week:

ðŸ§µ The 2-minute rule for insomnia:

1) If not asleep in 2 minutes, get up
2) Do something boring until sleepy
3) Return to bed
4) Repeat if needed

Breaks the anxiety cycle.

hook: The science behind morning sunlight exposure
content: The science behind morning sunlight exposure: your circadian rhythm is controlled by light sensors in your eyes. Getting bright light within 30 minutes of waking helps regulate your sleep-wake cycle naturally. No supplements needed.

hook: Here are some wellness tips for everyone
content: Here are some wellness tips for everyone. Health is important and we should all try to be healthy. There are many different things you can do. Exercise is good. Eating well helps too. Getting enough sleep matters.
